title: Help I need an explanation
body: I am in bronze 2 so it doesnt really matter.. but lately I have found that when I win a game of Ranked I only receive around 14-15 lp and when I lose I lose up from 22-25 lp. I think this is really unfair and would like an explanation on why this happens.. Please help

replies.body: Thanks.. I've been winning alot lately (in Ranked) with out of about 10 games Ive lost 2.. shouldnt my mmr be right?
not if you lost majority of your games prior to the 10 games
Your mmr is lower than it should be, this can be caused by losing a lot or by playing duo with people who are lower ranked than you.
